title: Kao ga Ii kara Yurushichau
original_name: 顔がいいから許しちゃう
sinopse:
Shinna's hobby is the "fan lifestyle." Up until now, the popular idol Yuzuru-kun has been her entire life. However, she's just moved to a suburb full of nature, so it's become difficult to go to events... But just then, she meets a boy with idol rank looks...!?

(Source: MU)

Included one-shot:
Volume 2: Tonari ni Star☆
